lessons.lesson: Always include viewport meta tag for mobile responsiveness
Validate HTML syntax before deployment to avoid browser rendering issues
Sanitize all user input to prevent XSS attacks
Use semantic HTML5 tags (header, nav, main, footer) for better SEO
Always test responsive design on at least 3 breakpoints (mobile, tablet, desktop)
Minimize HTTP requests by combining CSS and JS files
Use HTTPS for all production websites to ensure security
Implement proper error handling for form submissions
